ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ زَلْزَلَةَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ شَىْءٌ عَظِيمٌ
ayas.translation: O people! guard against (the punishment from) your Lord; surely the violence of the hour is a grievous thing.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nāsut-taqū rabbakum ۚ inna zalzalatas sā`ati shay-un `aẓīm

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ تَرَوْنَهَا تَذْهَلُ كُلُّ مُرْضِعَةٍ عَمَّآ أَرْضَعَتْ وَتَضَعُ كُلُّ ذَاتِ حَمْلٍ حَمْلَهَا وَتَرَى ٱلنَّاسَ سُكَـٰرَىٰ وَمَا هُم بِسُكَـٰرَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنَّ عَذَابَ ٱللَّهِ شَدِيدٌ
ayas.translation: On the day when you shall see it, every woman giving suck shall quit in confusion what she suckled, and every pregnant woman shall lay down her burden, and you shall see men intoxicated, and they shall not be intoxicated but the chastisement of Allah will be severe.
ayas.transliteration: yawma tarawnahā tadh-halu kullu murḍi`atin `ammā arḍa`at wataḍa`u kullu dhāti ḥamlin ḥamlahā wataran nāsa sukārā wa mā hum bisukārā walākinna `adhāballāhi shadīd

ayas.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَـٰدِلُ فِى ٱللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ وَيَتَّبِعُ كُلَّ شَيْطَـٰنٍ مَّرِيدٍ
ayas.translation: And among men there is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge and follows every rebellious Shaitan;
ayas.transliteration: wa minan nāsi man yujādilu fillāhi bighayri `il-min wayattabi`u kulla shayṭānin marīd

ayas.arabic: كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِ أَنَّهُۥ مَن تَوَلَّاهُ فَأَنَّهُۥ يُضِلُّهُۥ وَيَهْدِيهِ إِلَىٰ عَذَابِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
ayas.translation: Against him it is written down that whoever takes him for a friend, he shall lead him astray and conduct him to the chastisement of the burning fire.
ayas.transliteration: kutiba `alayhi annahu man tawallāhu fa-annahu yuḍilluhu wayahdīhi ilā `adhābis sa`īr

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِن كُنتُمْ فِى رَيْبٍ مِّنَ ٱلْبَعْثِ فَإِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰكُم مِّن تُرَابٍ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ ثُمَّ مِنْ عَلَقَةٍ ثُمَّ مِن مُّضْغَةٍ مُّخَلَّقَةٍ وَغَيْرِ مُخَلَّقَةٍ لِّنُبَيِّنَ لَكُمْ ۚ وَنُقِرُّ فِى ٱلْأَرْحَامِ مَا نَشَآءُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ثُمَّ نُخْرِجُكُمْ طِفْلًا ثُمَّ لِتَبْلُغُوٓا۟ أَشُدَّكُمْ ۖ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُتَوَفَّىٰ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَرْذَلِ ٱلْعُمُرِ لِكَيْلَا يَعْلَمَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ عِلْمٍ شَيْـًٔا ۚ وَتَرَى ٱلْأَرْضَ هَامِدَةً فَإِذَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَآءَ ٱهْتَزَّتْ وَرَبَتْ وَأَنۢبَتَتْ مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ
ayas.translation: O people! if you are in doubt about the raising, then surely We created you from dust, then from a small seed, then from a clot, then from a lump of flesh, complete in make and incomplete, that We may make clear to you; and We cause what We please to stay in the wombs till an appointed time, then We bring you forth as babies, then that you may attain your maturity; and of you is he who is caused to die, and of you is he who is brought back to the worst part of life, so that after having knowledge he does not know anything; and you see the earth sterile land, but when We send down on it the water, it stirs and swells and brings forth of every kind a beautiful herbage.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nāsu in kuntum fī raybin minal ba`thi fa-innā khalaqnākum min turābin thumma min nuṭfatin thumma min `alaqatin thumma min muḍghatim mukhallaqatin waghayri mukhallaqatin linubayyina lakum ۚ wanuqirru fil-arḥāmi mā nashā-u ilā ajalin musamman thumma nukhrijukum ṭiflan thumma litablughū ashuddakum ۖ wa minkum man yutawaffā wa minkum man yuraddu ilā ardhalil `umuri likaylā ya`lama min ba`di `il-min shay-ā ۚ wataral-arḍa hāmidatan fa-idhā anzalnā `alayhal mā-ah-tazzat warabat wa-anbatat min kulli zawjin bahīj

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَأَنَّهُۥ يُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَأَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
ayas.translation: This is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead and because He has power over all things
ayas.transliteration: dhālika bi-annallāha huwal ḥaqqu wa-annahu yuḥyil mawtā wa-annahu `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ لَّا رَيْبَ فِيهَا وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْعَثُ مَن فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
ayas.translation: And because the hour is coming, there is no doubt about it; and because Allah shall raise up those who are in the graves.
ayas.transliteration: wa-annas sā`ata ātiyatun lā rayba fīhā wa-annallāha yab`athu man fil qubūr

ayas.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَـٰدِلُ فِى ٱللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ وَلَا هُدًى وَلَا كِتَـٰبٍ مُّنِيرٍ
ayas.translation: And among men there is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge and without guidance and without an illuminating book,
ayas.transliteration: wa minan nāsi man yujādilu fillāhi bighayri `il-min walā hudan walā kitābin munīr

ayas.arabic: ثَانِىَ عِطْفِهِۦ لِيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَهُۥ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا خِزْىٌ ۖ وَنُذِيقُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ عَذَابَ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
ayas.translation: Turning away haughtily that he may lead (others) astray from the way of Allah; for him is disgrace in this world, and on the day of resurrection We will make him taste the punishment of burning:
ayas.transliteration: thāniya `iṭfihi liyuḍilla `an sabīlillāh ۖ lahu fid dunyā khizyun ۖ wanudhīquhu yawmal qiyāmati `adhābal ḥarīq

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاكَ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيْسَ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
ayas.translation: This is due to what your two hands have sent before, and because Allah is not in the least unjust to the servants.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat yadāka wa-annallāha laysa biẓallāmin lil`abīd

ayas.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَعْبُدُ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ حَرْفٍ ۖ فَإِنْ أَصَابَهُۥ خَيْرٌ ٱطْمَأَنَّ بِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنْ أَصَابَتْهُ فِتْنَةٌ ٱنقَلَبَ عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦ خَسِرَ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
ayas.translation: And among men is he who serves Allah (standing) on the verge, so that if good befalls him he is satisfied therewith, but if a trial afflict him he turns back headlong; he loses this world as well as the hereafter; that is a manifest loss.
ayas.transliteration: wa minan nāsi man ya`budullāha `alā ḥarf ۖ fa-in aṣābahu khayruni-ma-anna bih ۖ wa in aṣābat-hu fitnatunin-qalaba `alā wajhihi khasirad dunyā wal-ākhirah ۚ dhālika huwal khusrānul mubīn

ayas.arabic: يَدْعُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُۥ وَمَا لَا يَنفَعُهُۥ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلضَّلَـٰلُ ٱلْبَعِيدُ
ayas.translation: He calls besides Allah upon that which does not harm him and that which does not profit him, that is the great straying.
ayas.transliteration: yad`ū min dūnillāhi mā lā yaḍurruhu wa mā lā yanfa`uh ۚ dhālika huwaḍ ḍalālul ba`īd

ayas.arabic: يَدْعُوا۟ لَمَن ضَرُّهُۥٓ أَقْرَبُ مِن نَّفْعِهِۦ ۚ لَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَوْلَىٰ وَلَبِئْسَ ٱلْعَشِيرُ
ayas.translation: He calls upon him whose harm is nearer than his profit; evil certainly is the guardian and evil certainly is the associate.
ayas.transliteration: yad`ū laman ḍarruhu aqrabu min naf`ih ۚ labi-sal mawlā walabi-sal `ashīr

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفْعَلُ مَا يُرِيدُ
ayas.translation: Surely Allah will cause those who believe and do good deeds to enter gardens beneath which rivers flow, surely Allah does what He pleases.
ayas.transliteration: innallāha yudkhilul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār ۚ innallāha yaf`alu mā yurīd

ayas.arabic: مَن كَانَ يَظُنُّ أَن لَّن يَنصُرَهُ ٱللَّهُ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ بِسَبَبٍ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ ثُمَّ لْيَقْطَعْ فَلْيَنظُرْ هَلْ يُذْهِبَنَّ كَيْدُهُۥ مَا يَغِيظُ
ayas.translation: Whoever thinks that Allah will not assist him in this life and the hereafter, let him stretch a rope to the ceiling, then let him cut (it) off, then let him see if his struggle will take away that at which he is enraged.
ayas.transliteration: man kāna yaẓunnu an lan yanṣurahullāhu fid dunyā wal-ākhirati falyamdud bisababin ilas samā-i thummalyaqṭa` falyanẓur hal yudh-hibanna kayduhu mā yaghīẓ

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتٍۭ بَيِّنَـٰتٍ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهْدِى مَن يُرِيدُ
ayas.translation: And thus have We revealed it, being clear arguments, and because Allah guides whom He intends.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu āyātin bayyinātin wa-annallāha yahdī man yurīd

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ وَٱلصَّـٰبِـِٔينَ وَٱلنَّصَـٰرَىٰ وَٱلْمَجُوسَ وَٱلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفْصِلُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
ayas.translation: Surely those who believe and those who are Jews and the Sabeans and the Christians and the Magians and those who associate (others with Allah)-- surely Allah will decide between them on the day of resurrection; surely Allah is a witness over all things.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna āmanū wal ladhīna hādū waṣ ṣābi-īna wan naṣārā wal majūsa wal ladhīna ashrakū innallāha yafṣilu baynahum yawmal qiyāmah ۚ innallāha `alā kulli shay-in shahīd

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَسْجُدُ لَهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ وَٱلنُّجُومُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ وَٱلدَّوَآبُّ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۗ وَمَن يُهِنِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّكْرِمٍ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفْعَلُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۩
ayas.translation: Do you not see that Allah is He, Whom obeys whoever is in the heavens and whoever is in the earth, and the sun and the moon and the stars, and the mountains and the trees, and the animals and many of the people; and many there are against whom chastisement has become necessary; and whomsoever Allah abases, there is none who can make him honorable; surely Allah does what He pleases.
ayas.transliteration: alam tara annallāha yasjudu lahu man fis samāwāti wa man fil-arḍi wash shamsu wal qamaru wan nujūmu wal jibālu wash shajaru wad dawābbu wakathīrun minan nās ۖ wakathīrun ḥaqqa `alayhil `adhāb ۗ wa man yuhinillāhu famā lahu min mukrim ۚ innallāha yaf`alu mā yashā-u ۩

ayas.arabic: هَـٰذَانِ خَصْمَانِ ٱخْتَصَمُوا۟ فِى رَبِّهِمْ ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ قُطِّعَتْ لَهُمْ ثِيَابٌ مِّن نَّارٍ يُصَبُّ مِن فَوْقِ رُءُوسِهِمُ ٱلْحَمِيمُ
ayas.translation: These are two adversaries who dispute about their Lord; then (as to) those who disbelieve, for them are cut out garments of fire, boiling water shall be poured over their heads.
ayas.transliteration: hādhāni khaṣmānikh-taṣamū fī rabbihim ۖ fal ladhīna kafarū quṭṭi`at lahum thiyābun min nāriy yuṣabbu min fawqi ru-ūsihimul ḥamīm

ayas.arabic: يُصْهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِى بُطُونِهِمْ وَٱلْجُلُودُ
ayas.translation: With it shall be melted what is in their bellies and (their) skins as well.
ayas.transliteration: yuṣ-haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal julūd

ayas.arabic: وَلَهُم مَّقَـٰمِعُ مِنْ حَدِيدٍ
ayas.translation: And for them are whips of iron.
ayas.transliteration: walahum maqāmi`u min ḥadīd

ayas.arabic: كُلَّمَآ أَرَادُوٓا۟ أَن يَخْرُجُوا۟ مِنْهَا مِنْ غَمٍّ أُعِيدُوا۟ فِيهَا وَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
ayas.translation: Whenever they will desire to go forth from it, from grief, they shall be turned back into it, and taste the chastisement of burning.
ayas.transliteration: kullamā arādū an yakhrujū minhā min ghammin u`īdū fīhā wadhūqū `adhābal ḥarīq

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ وَلُؤْلُؤًا ۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمْ فِيهَا حَرِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Surely Allah will make those who believe and do good deeds enter gardens beneath which rivers flow; they shall be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and (with) pearls, and their garments therein shall be of silk.
ayas.transliteration: innallāha yudkhilul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru yuḥallawna fīhā min asāwira min dhahabin walu-lu-ā ۖ walibāsuhum fīhā ḥarīr

ayas.arabic: وَهُدُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ وَهُدُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
ayas.translation: And they are guided to goodly words and they are guided into the path of the Praised One.
ayas.transliteration: wahudū ilaṭ ṭayyibi minal qawli wahudū ilā ṣirāṭil ḥamīd

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلْنَـٰهُ لِلنَّاسِ سَوَآءً ٱلْعَـٰكِفُ فِيهِ وَٱلْبَادِ ۚ وَمَن يُرِدْ فِيهِ بِإِلْحَادٍۭ بِظُلْمٍ نُّذِقْهُ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Surely (as for) those who disbelieve, and hinder (men) from Allah's way and from the Sacred Mosque which We have made equally for all men, (for) the dweller therein and (for) the visitor, and whoever shall incline therein to wrong unjustly, We will make him taste of a painful chastisement.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna kafarū wayaṣuddūna `an sabīlillāhi wal masjidil ḥarāmil ladhī ja`alnāhu linnāsi sawā-anil-`ākifu fīhi wal bād ۚ wa man yurid fīhi bi-ilḥādin biẓul-min nudhiqhu min `adhābin alīm

ayas.arabic: وَإِذْ بَوَّأْنَا لِإِبْرَٰهِيمَ مَكَانَ ٱلْبَيْتِ أَن لَّا تُشْرِكْ بِى شَيْـًٔا وَطَهِّرْ بَيْتِىَ لِلطَّآئِفِينَ وَٱلْقَآئِمِينَ وَٱلرُّكَّعِ ٱلسُّجُودِ
ayas.translation: And when We assigned to Ibrahim the place of the House, saying: Do not associate with Me aught, and purify My House for those who make the circuit and stand to pray and bow and prostrate themselves.
ayas.transliteration: wa idh bawwa-nā li-ibrāhīma makānal bayti an lā tushrik bī shay-an waṭahhir baytiya liṭṭā-ifīna wal qā-imīna war rukka`is sujūd

ayas.arabic: وَأَذِّن فِى ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَجِّ يَأْتُوكَ رِجَالًا وَعَلَىٰ كُلِّ ضَامِرٍ يَأْتِينَ مِن كُلِّ فَجٍّ عَمِيقٍ
ayas.translation: And proclaim among men the Pilgrimage: they will come to you on foot and on every lean camel, coming from every remote path,
ayas.transliteration: wa-adhhin fin nāsi bil ḥajji ya-tūka rijālan wa`alā kulli ḍāmiriy ya-tīna min kulli fajjin `amīq

ayas.arabic: لِّيَشْهَدُوا۟ مَنَـٰفِعَ لَهُمْ وَيَذْكُرُوا۟ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ فِىٓ أَيَّامٍ مَّعْلُومَـٰتٍ عَلَىٰ مَا رَزَقَهُم مِّنۢ بَهِيمَةِ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ۖ فَكُلُوا۟ مِنْهَا وَأَطْعِمُوا۟ ٱلْبَآئِسَ ٱلْفَقِيرَ
ayas.translation: That they may witness advantages for them and mention the name of Allah during stated days over what He has given them of the cattle quadrupeds, then eat of them and feed the distressed one, the needy.
ayas.transliteration: liyash-hadū manāfi`a lahum wayadhkurus-mallāhi fī ayyāmin ma`lūmātin `alā mā razaqahum min bahīmatil-an`ām ۖ fakulū minhā wa-aṭ`imul bā-isal faqīr

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ لْيَقْضُوا۟ تَفَثَهُمْ وَلْيُوفُوا۟ نُذُورَهُمْ وَلْيَطَّوَّفُوا۟ بِٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْعَتِيقِ
ayas.translation: Then let them accomplish their needful acts of shaving and cleansing, and let them fulfil their vows and let them go round the Ancient House.
ayas.transliteration: thummalyaqḍū tafathahum walūfū nudhūrahum walyaṭṭawwafū bil baytil `atīq

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ وَمَن يُعَظِّمْ حُرُمَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ ۗ وَأُحِلَّتْ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمُ إِلَّا مَا يُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱجْتَنِبُوا۟ ٱلرِّجْسَ مِنَ ٱلْأَوْثَـٰنِ وَٱجْتَنِبُوا۟ قَوْلَ ٱلزُّورِ
ayas.translation: That (shall be so); and whoever respects the sacred ordinances of Allah, it is better for him with his Lord; and the cattle are made lawful for you, except that which is recited to you, therefore avoid the uncleanness of the idols and avoid false words,
ayas.transliteration: dhālika wa man yu`aẓẓim ḥurumātillāhi fahuwa khayrul lahu `inda rabbih ۗ wa-uḥillat lakumul-an`āmu illā mā yutlā `alaykum ۖ fajtanibur rijsa minal-awthāni wajtanibū qawlaz zūr

ayas.arabic: حُنَفَآءَ لِلَّهِ غَيْرَ مُشْرِكِينَ بِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يُشْرِكْ بِٱللَّهِ فَكَأَنَّمَا خَرَّ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَتَخْطَفُهُ ٱلطَّيْرُ أَوْ تَهْوِى بِهِ ٱلرِّيحُ فِى مَكَانٍ سَحِيقٍ
ayas.translation: Being upright for Allah, not associating aught with Him and whoever associates (others) with Allah, it is as though he had fallen from on high, then the birds snatch him away or the wind carries him off to a far-distant place.
ayas.transliteration: ḥunafā-a lillāhi ghayra mushrikīna bih ۚ wa man yushrik billāhi faka-annamā kharra minas samā-i fatakhṭafuhuṭ ṭayru aw tahwy bihir rīḥu fī makānin saḥīq

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ وَمَن يُعَظِّمْ شَعَـٰٓئِرَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّهَا مِن تَقْوَى ٱلْقُلُوبِ
ayas.translation: That (shall be so); and whoever respects the signs of Allah, this surely is (the outcome) of the piety of hearts.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika wa man yu`aẓẓim sha`ā-irallāhi fa-innahā min taqwal qulūb

ayas.arabic: لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ثُمَّ مَحِلُّهَآ إِلَى ٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْعَتِيقِ
ayas.translation: You have advantages in them till a fixed time, then their place of sacrifice is the Ancient House.
ayas.transliteration: lakum fīhā manāfi`u ilā ajalin musamman thumma maḥilluhā ilal-baytil `atīq

ayas.arabic: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ جَعَلْنَا مَنسَكًا لِّيَذْكُرُوا۟ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَىٰ مَا رَزَقَهُم مِّنۢ بَهِيمَةِ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ۗ فَإِلَـٰهُكُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ فَلَهُۥٓ أَسْلِمُوا۟ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُخْبِتِينَ
ayas.translation: And to every nation We appointed acts of devotion that they may mention the name of Allah on what He has given them of the cattle quadrupeds; so your god is One God, therefore to Him should you submit, and give good news to the humble,
ayas.transliteration: walikulli ummatin ja`alnā mansakal liyadhkurus-mallāhi `alā mā razaqahum min bahīmatil-an`ām ۗ fa-ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun falahu aslimū ۗ wabashhiril mukhbitīn

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَجِلَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَهُمْ وَٱلْمُقِيمِى ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
ayas.translation: (To) those whose hearts tremble when Allah is mentioned, and those who are patient under that which afflicts them, and those who keep up prayer, and spend (benevolently) out of what We have given them.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna idhā dhukirallāhu wajilat qulūbuhum waṣ ṣābirīna `alā mā aṣābahum wal muqīmiṣ ṣalāti wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْبُدْنَ جَعَلْنَـٰهَا لَكُم مِّن شَعَـٰٓئِرِ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ فِيهَا خَيْرٌ ۖ فَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهَا صَوَآفَّ ۖ فَإِذَا وَجَبَتْ جُنُوبُهَا فَكُلُوا۟ مِنْهَا وَأَطْعِمُوا۟ ٱلْقَانِعَ وَٱلْمُعْتَرَّ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ سَخَّرْنَـٰهَا لَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
ayas.translation: And (as for) the camels, We have made them of the signs of the religion of Allah for you; for you therein is much good; therefore mention the name of Allah on them as they stand in a row, then when they fall down eat of them and feed the poor man who is contented and the beggar; thus have We made them subservient to you, that you may be grateful.
ayas.transliteration: wal budna ja`alnāhā lakum min sha`ā-irillāhi lakum fīhā khayr ۖ fadhkurus-mallāhi `alayhā ṣawāff ۖ fa-idhā wajabat junūbuhā fakulū minhā wa-aṭ`imul qāni`a wal mu`tarr ۚ kadhālika sakhharnāhā lakum la`allakum tashkurūn

ayas.arabic: لَن يَنَالَ ٱللَّهَ لُحُومُهَا وَلَا دِمَآؤُهَا وَلَـٰكِن يَنَالُهُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ مِنكُمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ سَخَّرَهَا لَكُمْ لِتُكَبِّرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَىٰكُمْ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayas.translation: There does not reach Allah their flesh nor their blood, but to Him is acceptable the guarding (against evil) on your part; thus has He made them subservient to you, that you may magnify Allah because He has guided you aright; and give good news to those who do good (to others).
ayas.transliteration: lan yanālallāha luḥūmuhā walā dimā-uhā walākin yanāluhut taqwā minkum ۚ kadhālika sakhharahā lakum litukabbirullāha `alā mā hadākum ۗ wabashhiril muḥsinīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدَٰفِعُ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوَّانٍ كَفُورٍ
ayas.translation: Surely Allah will defend those who believe; surely Allah does not love any one who is unfaithful, ungrateful.
ayas.transliteration: innallāha yudāfi`u `anil ladhīna āmanū ۗ innallāha lā yuḥibbu kulla khawwānin kafūr

ayas.arabic: أُذِنَ لِلَّذِينَ يُقَـٰتَلُونَ بِأَنَّهُمْ ظُلِمُوا۟ ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ نَصْرِهِمْ لَقَدِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Permission (to fight) is given to those upon whom war is made because they are oppressed, and most surely Allah is well able to assist them;
ayas.transliteration: udhina lilladhīna yuqātalūna bi-annahum ẓulimū ۚ wa innallāha `alā naṣrihim laqadīr

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ أُخْرِجُوا۟ مِن دِيَـٰرِهِم بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّ إِلَّآ أَن يَقُولُوا۟ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ۗ وَلَوْلَا دَفْعُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلنَّاسَ بَعْضَهُم بِبَعْضٍ لَّهُدِّمَتْ صَوَٰمِعُ وَبِيَعٌ وَصَلَوَٰتٌ وَمَسَـٰجِدُ يُذْكَرُ فِيهَا ٱسْمُ ٱللَّهِ كَثِيرًا ۗ وَلَيَنصُرَنَّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌ
ayas.translation: Those who have been expelled from their homes without a just cause except that they say: Our Lord is Allah. And had there not been Allah's repelling some people by others, certainly there would have been pulled down cloisters and churches and synagogues and mosques in which Allah's name is much remembered; and surely Allah will help him who helps His cause; most surely Allah is Strong, Mighty.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna ukhrijū min diyārihim bighayri ḥaqqin illā an yaqūlū rabbunallāh ۗ walawlā daf`ullāhin nāsa ba`ḍahum biba`ḍin lahuddimat ṣawāmi`u wabiya`un waṣalawātun wa masājidu yudhkaru fīhas-mullāhi kathīrā ۗ walayanṣurannallāhu man yanṣuruh ۗ innallāha laqawiyyun `azīz

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِن مَّكَّنَّـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَمَرُوا۟ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَنَهَوْا۟ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْأُمُورِ
ayas.translation: Those who, should We establish them in the land, will keep up prayer and pay the poor-rate and enjoin good and forbid evil; and Allah's is the end of affairs.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna in makkannāhum fil-arḍi aqāmuṣ ṣalāta wa-ātawuz zakāta wa-amarū bil ma`rūfi wanahaw `anil munkar ۗ walillāhi `āqibatul-umūr

ayas.arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَثَمُودُ
ayas.translation: And if they reject you, then already before you did the people of Nuh and Ad and Samood reject (prophets).
ayas.transliteration: wa in yukadhhibūka faqad kadhhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa`ādun wathamūd

ayas.arabic: وَقَوْمُ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ
ayas.translation: And the people of Ibrahim and the people of Lut,
ayas.transliteration: waqawmu ibrāhīma waqawmu lūṭ

ayas.arabic: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ مَدْيَنَ ۖ وَكُذِّبَ مُوسَىٰ فَأَمْلَيْتُ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُهُمْ ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
ayas.translation: As well as those of Madyan and Musa (too) was rejected, but I gave respite to the unbelievers, then did I overtake them, so how (severe) was My disapproval.
ayas.transliteration: wa-aṣ-ḥābu madyan ۖ wakudhhiba mūsā fa-amlaytu lilkāfirīna thumma akhadhtuhum ۖ fakayfa kāna nakīr

ayas.arabic: فَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَا وَهِىَ ظَالِمَةٌ فَهِىَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَبِئْرٍ مُّعَطَّلَةٍ وَقَصْرٍ مَّشِيدٍ
ayas.translation: So how many a town did We destroy while it was unjust, so it was fallen down upon its roofs, and (how many a) deserted well and palace raised high.
ayas.transliteration: faka-ayyin min qaryatin ahlaknāhā wahiya ẓālimatun fahiya khāwiyatun `alā `urūshihā wabi-rin mu`aṭṭalatin waqaṣrin mashīd

ayas.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَتَكُونَ لَهُمْ قُلُوبٌ يَعْقِلُونَ بِهَآ أَوْ ءَاذَانٌ يَسْمَعُونَ بِهَا ۖ فَإِنَّهَا لَا تَعْمَى ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ وَلَـٰكِن تَعْمَى ٱلْقُلُوبُ ٱلَّتِى فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayas.translation: Have they not travelled in the land so that they should have hearts with which to understand, or ears with which to hear? For surely it is not the eyes that are blind, but blind are the hearts which are in the breasts.
ayas.transliteration: afalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fatakūna lahum qulūbun ya`qilūna bihā aw ādhānun yasma`ūna bihā ۖ fa-innahā lā ta`mal-abṣāru walākin ta`mal qulūbul latī fiṣ ṣudūr

ayas.arabic: وَيَسْتَعْجِلُونَكَ بِٱلْعَذَابِ وَلَن يُخْلِفَ ٱللَّهُ وَعْدَهُۥ ۚ وَإِنَّ يَوْمًا عِندَ رَبِّكَ كَأَلْفِ سَنَةٍ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ
ayas.translation: And they ask you to hasten on the punishment, and Allah will by no means fail in His promise, and surely a day with your Lord is as a thousand years of what you number.
ayas.transliteration: wayasta`jilūnaka bil `adhābi walan yukhlifallāhu wa`dah ۚ wa inna yawman `inda rabbika ka-alfi sanatim mimmā ta`uddūn

ayas.arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَمْلَيْتُ لَهَا وَهِىَ ظَالِمَةٌ ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُهَا وَإِلَىَّ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
ayas.translation: And how many a town to which I gave respite while it was unjust, then I overtook it, and to Me is the return.
ayas.transliteration: waka-ayyin min qaryatin amlaytu lahā wahiya ẓālimatun thumma akhadhtuhā wa ilayyal maṣīr

ayas.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: Say: O people! I am only a plain warner to you.
ayas.transliteration: qul yā-ayyuhan nāsu innamā ana lakum nadhīrun mubīn

ayas.arabic: فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَرِزْقٌ كَرِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Then (as for) those who believe and do good, they shall have forgiveness and an honorable sustenance.
ayas.transliteration: fal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun warizqun karīm

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوْا۟ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا مُعَـٰجِزِينَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayas.translation: And (as for) those who strive to oppose Our communications, they shall be the inmates of the flaming fire.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna sa`aw fī āyātinā mu`ājizīna ulā-ika aṣ-ḥābul jaḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٍ وَلَا نَبِىٍّ إِلَّآ إِذَا تَمَنَّىٰٓ أَلْقَى ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فِىٓ أُمْنِيَّتِهِۦ فَيَنسَخُ ٱللَّهُ مَا يُلْقِى ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ ثُمَّ يُحْكِمُ ٱللَّهُ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And We did not send before you any apostle or prophet, but when he desired, the Shaitan made a suggestion respecting his desire; but Allah annuls that which the Shaitan casts, then does Allah establish His communications, and Allah is Knowing, Wise,
ayas.transliteration: wa mā arsalnā min qablika min rasūlin walā nabiyyin illā idhā tamannā alqash shayṭānu fī umniyyatihi fayansakhullāhu mā yulqish shayṭānu thumma yuḥkimullāhu āyātih ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: لِّيَجْعَلَ مَا يُلْقِى ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَٱلْقَاسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ لَفِى شِقَاقٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
ayas.translation: So that He may make what the Shaitan casts a trial for those in whose hearts is disease and those whose hearts are hard; and most surely the unjust are in a great opposition,
ayas.transliteration: liyaj`ala mā yulqish shayṭānu fitnatan lilladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun wal qāsiyati qulūbuhum ۗ wa innaẓ ẓālimīna lafī shiqāqin ba`īd

ayas.arabic: وَلِيَعْلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ أَنَّهُ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَيُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَتُخْبِتَ لَهُۥ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
ayas.translation: And that those who have been given the knowledge may know that it is the truth from your Lord, so they may believe in it and their hearts may be lowly before it; and most surely Allah is the Guide of those who believe into a right path.
ayas.transliteration: waliya`lamal ladhīna ūtul `il-ma annahul ḥaqqu min rabbika fayu-minū bihi fatukhbita lahu qulūbuhum ۗ wa innallāha lahādil ladhīna āmanū ilā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm

ayas.arabic: وَلَا يَزَالُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى مِرْيَةٍ مِّنْهُ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغْتَةً أَوْ يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَقِيمٍ
ayas.translation: And those who disbelieve shall not cease to be in doubt concerning it until the hour overtakes them suddenly, or there comes on them the chastisement of a destructive day.
ayas.transliteration: walā yazālul ladhīna kafarū fī miryatim minhu ḥattā ta-tiyahumus sā`atu baghtatan aw ya-tiyahum `adhābu yawmin `aqīm

ayas.arabic: ٱلْمُلْكُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فِى جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
ayas.translation: The kingdom on that day shall be Allah's; He will judge between them; so those who believe and do good will be in gardens of bliss.
ayas.transliteration: al-mulku yawma-idhin lillāhi yaḥkumu baynahum ۚ fal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti fī jannātin na`īm

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ
ayas.translation: And (as for) those who disbelieve in and reject Our communications, these it is who shall have a disgraceful chastisement.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna kafarū wakadhhabū bi-āyātinā fa-ulā-ika lahum `adhābun muhīn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ قُتِلُوٓا۟ أَوْ مَاتُوا۟ لَيَرْزُقَنَّهُمُ ٱللَّهُ رِزْقًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
ayas.translation: And (as for) those who fly in Allah's way and are then slain or die, Allah will most certainly grant them a goodly sustenance, and most surely Allah is the best Giver of sustenance.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hājarū fī sabīlillāhi thumma qutilū aw mātū layarzuqannahumullāhu rizqan ḥasanā ۚ wa innallāha lahuwa khayrur rāziqīn

ayas.arabic: لَيُدْخِلَنَّهُم مُّدْخَلًا يَرْضَوْنَهُۥ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: He will certainly cause them to enter a place of entrance which they shall be well pleased with, and most surely Allah is Knowing, Forbearing.
ayas.transliteration: layudkhilannahum mudkhalan yarḍawnah ۗ wa innallāha la`alīmun ḥalīm

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ وَمَنْ عَاقَبَ بِمِثْلِ مَا عُوقِبَ بِهِۦ ثُمَّ بُغِىَ عَلَيْهِ لَيَنصُرَنَّهُ ٱللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٌ
ayas.translation: That (shall be so); and he who retaliates with the like of that with which he has been afflicted and he has been oppressed, Allah will most certainly aid him; most surely Allah is Pardoning, Forgiving.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika wa man `āqaba bimithli mā `ūqiba bihi thumma bughiya `alayhi layanṣurannahullāh ۗ innallāha la`afuwwun ghafūr

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيْلَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِى ٱلَّيْلِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۢ بَصِيرٌ
ayas.translation: That is because Allah causes the night to enter into the day and causes the day to enter into the night, and because Allah is Hearing, Seeing.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika bi-annallāha yūlijul layla fin nahāri wayūlijun nahāra fil layli wa-annallāha samī`un baṣīr

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَأَنَّ مَا يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ هُوَ ٱلْبَـٰطِلُ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
ayas.translation: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that what they call upon besides Him-- that is the falsehood, and because Allah is the High, the Great.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika bi-annallāha huwal ḥaqqu wa-anna mā yad`ūna min dūnihi huwal bāṭilu wa-annallāha huwal `aliyyul kabīr

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَتُصْبِحُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مُخْضَرَّةً ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Do you not see that Allah sends down water from the cloud so the earth becomes green? Surely Allah is Benignant, Aware.
ayas.transliteration: alam tara annallāha anzala minas samā-i mā-an fatuṣbiḥul-arḍu mukhḍarrah ۗ innallāha laṭīfun khabīr

ayas.arabic: لَّهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلْغَنِىُّ ٱلْحَمِيدُ
ayas.translation: His is whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth; and most surely Allah is the Self-sufficient, the Praised.
ayas.transliteration: lahu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۗ wa innallāha lahuwal ghaniyyul ḥamīd

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱلْفُلْكَ تَجْرِى فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ بِأَمْرِهِۦ وَيُمْسِكُ ٱلسَّمَآءَ أَن تَقَعَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِٱلنَّاسِ لَرَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Do you not see that Allah has made subservient to you whatsoever is in the earth and the ships running in the sea by His command? And He withholds the heaven from falling on the earth except with His permission; most surely Allah is Compassionate, Merciful to men.
ayas.transliteration: alam tara annallāha sakhhara lakum mā fil-arḍi wal fulka tajrī fil baḥri bi-amrihi wayumsikus samā-a an taqa`a `alal-arḍi illā bi-idhnih ۗ innallāha bin nāsi lara-ūfun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحْيَاكُمْ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُحْيِيكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَكَفُورٌ
ayas.translation: And He it is Who has brought you to life, then He will cause you to die, then bring you to life (again); most surely man is ungrateful.
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī aḥyākum thumma yumītukum thumma yuḥyīkum ۗ innal-insāna lakafūr

ayas.arabic: لِّكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ جَعَلْنَا مَنسَكًا هُمْ نَاسِكُوهُ ۖ فَلَا يُنَـٰزِعُنَّكَ فِى ٱلْأَمْرِ ۚ وَٱدْعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًى مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
ayas.translation: To every nation We appointed acts of devotion which they observe, therefore they should not dispute with you about the matter and call to your Lord; most surely you are on a right way.
ayas.transliteration: likulli ummatin ja`alnā mansakan hum nāsikūh ۖ falā yunāzi`unnaka fil-amr ۚ wad`u ilā rabbik ۖ innaka la`alā hudan mustaqīm

ayas.arabic: وَإِن جَـٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: And if they contend with you, say: Allah best knows what you do.
ayas.transliteration: wa in jādalūka faqulillāhu a`lamu bimā ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فِيمَا كُنتُمْ فِيهِ تَخْتَلِفُونَ
ayas.translation: Allah will judge between you on the day of resurrection respecting that in which you differ.
ayas.transliteration: allāhu yaḥkumu baynakum yawmal qiyāmati fīmā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūn

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ فِى كِتَـٰبٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Do you not know that Allah knows what is in the heaven and the earth? Surely this is in a book; surely this is easy to Allah.
ayas.transliteration: alam ta`lam annallāha ya`lamu mā fis samā-i wal-arḍ ۗ inna dhālika fī kitāb ۚ inna dhālika `alallāhi yasīr

ayas.arabic: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يُنَزِّلْ بِهِۦ سُلْطَـٰنًا وَمَا لَيْسَ لَهُم بِهِۦ عِلْمٌ ۗ وَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ
ayas.translation: And they serve besides Allah that for which He has not sent any authority, and that of which they have no knowledge; and for the unjust there shall be no helper.
ayas.transliteration: waya`budūna min dūnillāhi mā lam yunazzil bihi sulṭānan wa mā laysa lahum bihi `il-m ۗ wa mā liẓẓālimīna min naṣīr

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلْمُنكَرَ ۖ يَكَادُونَ يَسْطُونَ بِٱلَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا ۗ قُلْ أَفَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِشَرٍّ مِّن ذَٰلِكُمُ ۗ ٱلنَّارُ وَعَدَهَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
ayas.translation: And when Our clear communications are recited to them you will find denial on the faces of those who disbelieve; they almost spring upon those who recite to them Our communications. Say: Shall I inform you of what is worse than this? The fire; Allah has promised it to those who disbelieve; and how evil the resort!
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā tutlā `alayhim āyātunā bayyinātin ta`rifu fī wujūhil ladhīna kafarul munkar ۖ yakādūna yasṭūna bil ladhīna yatlūna `alayhim āyātinā ۗ qul afa-unabbi-ukum bisharrin min dhālikum ۗ an-nāru wa`adahallāhul ladhīna kafarū ۖ wabi-sal maṣīr

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ضُرِبَ مَثَلٌ فَٱسْتَمِعُوا۟ لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَن يَخْلُقُوا۟ ذُبَابًا وَلَوِ ٱجْتَمَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ ۖ وَإِن يَسْلُبْهُمُ ٱلذُّبَابُ شَيْـًٔا لَّا يَسْتَنقِذُوهُ مِنْهُ ۚ ضَعُفَ ٱلطَّالِبُ وَٱلْمَطْلُوبُ
ayas.translation: O people! a parable is set forth, therefore listen to it: surely those whom you call upon besides Allah cannot create fly, though they should all gather for it, and should the fly snatch away anything from them, they could not take it back from it; weak are the invoker and the invoked.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nāsu ḍuriba mathalun fastami`ū lah ۚ innal ladhīna tad`ūna min dūnillāhi lan yakhluqū dhubāban walawij-tama`ū lah ۖ wa in yaslubhumudh dhubābu shay-al lā yastanqidhūhu minh ۚ ḍa`ufaṭ ṭālibu wal maṭlūb

ayas.arabic: مَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌ
ayas.translation: They have not estimated Allah with the estimation that i due to Him; most surely Allah is Strong, Mighty.
ayas.transliteration: mā qadarullāha ḥaqqa qadrih ۗ innallāha laqawiyyun `azīz

ayas.arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَصْطَفِى مِنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلًا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۢ بَصِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Allah chooses apostles from among the angels and from among the men; surely Allah is Hearing, Seeing.
ayas.transliteration: allāhu yaṣṭafī minal malā-ikati rusulan wa minan nās ۚ innallāha samī`un baṣīr

ayas.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
ayas.translation: He knows what is before them and what is behind them and to Allah are all affairs turned back.
ayas.transliteration: ya`lamu mā bayna aydīhim wa mā khalfahum ۗ wa ilallāhi turja`ul-umūr

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ وَٱسْجُدُوا۟ وَٱعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ وَٱفْعَلُوا۟ ٱلْخَيْرَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ ۩
ayas.translation: O you who believe! bow down and prostrate yourselves and serve your Lord, and do good that you may succeed.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanur-ka`ū wasjudū wa`budū rabbakum wāf`alul khayra la`allakum tufliḥūn ۩

ayas.arabic: وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ فِى ٱللَّهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهِۦ ۚ هُوَ ٱجْتَبَىٰكُمْ وَمَا جَعَلَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِى ٱلدِّينِ مِنْ حَرَجٍ ۚ مِّلَّةَ أَبِيكُمْ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ۚ هُوَ سَمَّىٰكُمُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ مِن قَبْلُ وَفِى هَـٰذَا لِيَكُونَ ٱلرَّسُولُ شَهِيدًا عَلَيْكُمْ وَتَكُونُوا۟ شُهَدَآءَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ ۚ فَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱعْتَصِمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ هُوَ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ ۖ فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَوْلَىٰ وَنِعْمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ
ayas.translation: And strive hard in (the way of) Allah, (such) a striving as is due to Him; He has chosen you and has not laid upon you an hardship in religion; the faith of your father Ibrahim; He named you Muslims before and in this, that the Apostle may be a bearer of witness to you, and you may be bearers of witness to the people; therefore keep up prayer and pay the poor-rate and hold fast by Allah; He is your Guardian; how excellent the Guardian and how excellent the Helper!
ayas.transliteration: wajāhidū fillāhi ḥaqqa jihādih ۚ huwaj-tabākum wa mā ja`ala `alaykum fid dīni min ḥaraj ۚ millata abīkum ibrāhīm ۚ huwa sammākumul muslimīna min qablu wafī hādhā liyakūnar rasūlu shahīdan `alaykum watakūnū shuhadā-a `alan nās ۚ fa-aqīmuṣ ṣalāta wa-ātuz zakāta wa`taṣimū billāhi huwa mawlākum ۖ fani`mal mawlā wani`man naṣīr
